BasicInfo.short: FirstREX provides homeowners and home buyers with smart new financing alternatives to home equity loans and mortgages.

Products.name: REX Agreement
Products.description: Convert a portion of your home equity to cash today, with no interest charges and no new monthly payments.

Products.name: REX Homebuyer
Products.description: REX HomeBuyer provides up to half of your home purchase down payment in exchange for a share of the profit or loss when you decide to sell.
